Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I received the Tablet very quickly, came with cables and a small stylus.  I’ve been using it ~ 1 month now and it's been very good.All the programs work, downloaded Apps (games programs, and maps are working). The Wi-Fi range is good, logged cleanly into my family secure WiFi setup. Got used to the White color. Very good sharp graphics. I'm on YouTube, Netflix, Facebook, etc.Haven't figured out all the shortcut and home screen buttons yet.  Thank you.
Reviews.Title: Excelvan 9" Tablet Review

Reviews.Author: mamaislikethat
Reviews.Content: So far it seems to be okay for the money.  It's clear and pretty simple: though, the instructions could be a little more comprehensive .
Reviews.Title: Pretty nice!

CPU: Allwinner Cortex A8 1.2GHz
Display: 9" TFT LCD Capacitive Multi-touch Panel

Micro SD Card Slot for Memory Expansion
